name: test-work-playwright
description: Test work for a SDET position

scripts.regression: npx playwright test --config=playwright-e2e-tests.config.ts --project='E2E testing with chromium' --headed
scripts.regression-with-html-report: npx playwright test --config=playwright-e2e-tests.config.ts --project='E2E testing with chromium' --headed --reporter=html
